actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income gains from the condemnation of certain forest lands held in trust for the Klamath Indian Tribe.

summary.text: Excludes, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, from gross income gains from the condemnation of certain forest lands held in trust for the Klamath Indian Tribe.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income gains from the condemnation of certain forest lands held in trust for the Klamath Indian Tribe.
